segments.text: I'm really happy that you came to visit me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really missed you a lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've been missing you like crazy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't understand why you haven't come to visit me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell me what you've been up to .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've really been working a lot lately .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So what have you been up to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've just been working a lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Whatever the reason may be , I'm glad you visited me .
segments.speaker: S1
